sentences.sentence: Even our primate relatives do not come close: macaques can resolve only half an octave.
sentences.translation: 即使我们的灵长类亲戚也没有和我们接近的能力，短尾辕仅仅能辨析八度音阶的一半。

sentences.sentence: In this study, however, alcoholic female macaques self-administered so much booze that they stopped ovulating.
sentences.translation: 在类似的研究中，喝醉酒的雌猕猴会为自己寻找更多的酒，以至于导致排卵周期停止。

sentences.sentence: The discovery of mirror neurons in the brains of macaques about ten years ago sent shockwaves through the neuroscience community.
sentences.translation: 大约10年前在猕猴大脑中发现了镜像神经元，这给神经科学界带来了冲击。
